QuestData.Title: Snack Time
QuestData.Description: Cloud serpents love to eat, and one of their favorite treats is the sugar minnow.$B$BThese fish can be found in salt or fresh water anywhere in Pandaria. I trust you have some skill in fishing, and your own fishing pole to catch them?$B$BBring me a fresh catch and I'm sure the hungry beasts around here will be very grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fish 10 Sugar Minnow from any fresh or salt water in Pandaria.
